story.title: MTRAVEL Story
story.subtitle: A journey to bring the world closer to you

intro.title: Who We Are
intro.description1: MTRAVEL is Vietnam's leading online tour booking platform, born with the mission to revolutionize the travel experience for young Vietnamese people.
intro.description2: Since 2025, we have accompanied more than 50,000 customers on memorable journeys, connecting people with the most authentic local experiences.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Connecting travelers with memorable experiential journeys across Vietnam, bringing authentic perspectives to each destination.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: Dedicated, transparent, accompanying customers at every step. Ensuring the best service quality at reasonable prices.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted tour booking platform for young people who love travel and experiences, pioneering smart travel technology.

culture.title: Culture
culture.description: Customer-centric, promoting innovation and teamwork. Every member is an ambassador of Vietnamese culture.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously innovating, creating unique and distinctive travel experiences suitable for young generation trends.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: Developing sustainable tourism, respecting local culture and protecting the environment at each destination.

header.title: Travel Guide
header.subtitle: Useful tips to help you have a complete and memorable trip

packing.title: Packing preparation for travel
points: Bring clothes suitable for the weather and terrain of your destination.
Bring personal documents, plane tickets, tour/hotel bookings.
Basic personal items like toothpaste, towels, backup chargers.
Basic medicines: cold, stomach pain, motion sickness,...

weather.title: Notes on timing and weather
points: Check weather forecast 3-5 days before departure.
Avoid flood season in Central region (usually September-November).
Beach tourism should go from April-August for nice weather.

budget.title: Tips to save costs when traveling
points: Book tours and plane tickets early for better prices.
Travel in large groups to share vehicle, room, and guide costs.
Bring personal water bottles and snacks to save on small expenses.

tourType.title: Guided tour or independent travel?
points: Guided tours are suitable for elderly people, with ready-made itineraries and less worry.
Independent travel is flexible, suitable for young people who want to explore.
Can combine: book short local tours during independent travel.

bestTime.title: Best time
bestTime.description: Each destination has its own tourist season. Research carefully before booking tours for the best experience.

safety.title: Safety and health
safety.description: Always buy travel insurance and inform family of your itinerary to ensure safety.

cta.title: Ready for your next trip?
cta.subtitle: Discover attractive tour packages designed specifically for you

testimonial.quote: MTRAVEL has brought my family the most wonderful trips. Professional service from consultation to tour completion. Will definitely continue to travel with MTRAVEL on future journeys!
